attributes.action: act with the chancellor and her majesties revenue and customs to ensure that portsmouth football club pay the full amount ,£12000000, owed to hmrc, and if they dont, then they are wound up immedeiately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: absolute disgrace that portsmouth fc are being given such leeway over this, any normal hard working person would be prosecuted to the full extent of the law, not allowed to get away with tax dodging on such a huge scale.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Portsmouth FC and their administrators.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
